title: Look and leease for $300 off your first months rent
posting_body: ['The Melrose is an older quaint property that has been newly remodeled.', 'We are offering a "Construction Special" due to the exterior of the property still being worked on.', 'It is gorgeous on the inside and will be gorgeous on the outside once everything is completed.', 'Call us at', 'show contact info', 'to set an appointment to view an apartment!', 'FEES AND DEPOSITS', '$50 Application Fee', '$200 Admin Fee', 'Pet Deposit: $300.00 (Per Pet (½ Is Refundable, ½ Is Non-Refundable)', 'Pet Rent: $10.00', 'We Require Deposit Insurance (RHINO) $10-$20 a month depending on your credit', '*Tenants are responsible for their own electricity and a $50.00 water fee*', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', 'Lounge Area W/ Hammocks (1st Courtyard)', 'Beautiful Sparkling Pool (2nd Courtyard)', 'Dog Park', 'Access to Public Transportation', 'Easy Access to Freeways & Shopping Centers', 'Limited Gated Access', 'Great Location (20 Minutes From Downtown, The Galleria And Memorial City)', 'Covered Parking', 'Limited Guest Parking', 'Public Pools & Parks Nearby', 'APARTMENT FEATURES', '2-inch Faux Wood Blinds', 'Wood Floors', 'All-electric Kitchen', 'Natural Granite Counter Tops', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'Washer/Dryer Connections (We Also Proved The Appliances When Requested)', 'New Chrome Accessories', 'Track Lighting', 'Mini Walk In Closet In The Bedrooms (Washer/Dryer Connections)']
